title: 20 Pearson Street, Kangaroo Point, Qld 4169
property_highlights: Inner-city convenience1.5km to CBD, walk to river, parks, cafes, and new green bridge.
Alfresco entertainingRear deck flows to paved alfresco area with pond and gardens.
Classic charm & versatile layoutTimber floors, VJ walls, high ceilings, plus utility space downstairs.
description:
Auction Location: On-Site

Offering the space and privacy of a home with the convenience of inner-city living, this Kangaroo Point cottage combines charm, functionality and potential in a lifestyle location.

Positioned on a 407sqm corner block just 1.5km from the CBD, with the river, parks and dining at your doorstep, this address secures a prime setting with every amenity close at hand.

Extended and structurally larger than most comparable homes, the practical layout is enhanced with air-conditioning and features classic timber floors, VJ walls, and high ceilings. Immediately liveable with options to rent, update or transform (STCA), the property presents excellent versatility for your future plans.

Upstairs, living, dining and a kitchen flow onto the rear deck, and the paved alfresco area by the pond and gardens offers a spacious setting outdoors. The three bedrooms share the main bathroom, which features a clawfoot bathtub, and the lower level provides additional utility space, a second bathroom, and a two-car garage.

Property highlights include:
- Inner-city cottage on a 407sqm corner allotment
- Living room, dining room, kitchen with a gas cooktop
- Rear deck, oversized outdoor area with pond and gardens
- Three bedrooms, two bathrooms, two-car garage
- Versatile utility space downstairs
- Split system air-conditioning

Resting on the city's doorstep, this central position offers unbeatable living. The CBD is just a 1.5km walk away across the new green bridge, and you can enjoy scenic strolls along the neighbouring riverside, boardwalk, parklands, and famous Kangaroo Point Cliffs. 

Cafes and restaurants are a leisurely stroll away for coffee and dining, and days can be enjoyed watching matches at The Gabba or nearby at South Bank, South City Square and Howard Smith Wharves. Serviced by buses, ferries, bridges and tunnels, and close to the city's top inner-city schools, universities and hospitals, unrivalled convenience awaits.

Disclaimer:
This property is being sold by auction or without a price and therefore a price guide cannot be provided. The website may have filtered the property into a price bracket for website functionality purposes.

Disclaimer: 
We have in preparing this advertisement used our best endeavours to ensure the information contained is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements contained. Prospective purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this advertisement.
